org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests

Class FlightSqlExtensionScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests.FlightSqlScenario
      • org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests.FlightSqlExtensionScenario

  • public class FlightSqlExtensionScenario
extends FlightSqlScenario
    Integration test scenario for validating Flight SQL specs across multiple implementations. This should ensure that RPC objects are being built and parsed correctly for multiple languages and that the Arrow schemas are returned as expected.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.arrow.flight.integration.tests.FlightSqlScenario
